brace-expand.js

  • opal/stdlib/nodejs/node_modules/glob/node_modules/minimatch/test/brace-expand.js
  • Last modified: 2015-08-29 16:13:52 +0200

var tap = require(“tap”)

, minimatch = require("../")

tap.test(“brace expansion”, function (t) {

// [ pattern, [expanded] ]
; [ [ "a{b,c{d,e},{f,g}h}x{y,z}"
    , [ "abxy"
      , "abxz"
      , "acdxy"
      , "acdxz"
      , "acexy"
      , "acexz"
      , "afhxy"
      , "afhxz"
      , "aghxy"
      , "aghxz" ] ]
  , [ "a{1..5}b"
    , [ "a1b"
      , "a2b"
      , "a3b"
      , "a4b"
      , "a5b" ] ]
  , [ "a{b}c", ["a{b}c"] ]
  , [ "a{00..05}b"
    , [ "a00b"
      , "a01b"
      , "a02b"
      , "a03b"
      , "a04b"
      , "a05b" ] ]
  , [ "z{a,b},c}d", ["za,c}d", "zb,c}d"] ]
  , [ "z{a,b{,c}d", ["z{a,bd", "z{a,bcd"] ]
  , [ "a{b{c{d,e}f}g}h", ["a{b{cdf}g}h", "a{b{cef}g}h"] ]
  , [ "a{b{c{d,e}f{x,y}}g}h", ["a{b{cdfx}g}h", "a{b{cdfy}g}h", "a{b{cefx}g}h", "a{b{cefy}g}h"] ]
  , [ "a{b{c{d,e}f{x,y{}g}h", ["a{b{cdfxh", "a{b{cdfy{}gh", "a{b{cefxh", "a{b{cefy{}gh"] ]
].forEach(function (tc) {
  var p = tc[0]
    , expect = tc[1]
  t.equivalent(minimatch.braceExpand(p), expect, p)
})
console.error("ending")
t.end()

})
